reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress well-made and comfortable, appreciating how it hugs their curves. The material receives positive feedback, with one customer noting it's a combination of polyester and spandex. They like the fit, with one mentioning it's suitable for taller women, and another noting it's just over the knee. The dress is true to size, has nice stretch, and features a one-shoulder design that adds sophistication. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get this dress!!
items.body: This was a great dress! We had a white night on the cruise and it packed easily and didnâ€™t wrinkle. Easy to just pull out in throw on after a full day exploring cenotes. The fit was flattering and it was very comfortable. It accented the right places and was NOT see through!! I loved the length, midi just over the knee. Read more
items.author: Breanne

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering and versatile!
items.body: Comfortable, flattering, perfect for so many occasions! The ruching is forgiving, and the length is elegant/classy. I paired it with a red bow knot belt, red earrings and red heels for a ladies holiday glam/gift exchange. I also plan on wearing it for New Years Eve with a different belt/shoes & jewelry- a completely different look/vibe! This is a great staple LBD to have in your closet. Read more
items.author: D. Davies-Uttech

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress
items.body: Really nice dress. I ordered a large and it was a little too loose so I exchanged for a medium and it fits perfect. Fabric is a bit on the cheap side but it will work for an office party. Read more
items.author: ALC623

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved it
items.body: I love the look and feel of this dress. It was true to size and also had spandex, but did not ride up in any way. I received so many compliments! Read more
items.author: Lisa M Pointer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant and flattering
items.body: I recently purchased the Polyester Spandex White Women Elegant Bodycon One Shoulder Long Sleeve Ruched Midi Cocktail Party Dress, and I am absolutely thrilled with my purchase! First and foremost, the material is fantastic. The combination of polyester and spandex not only gives the dress a luxurious feel but also provides the perfect amount of stretch to hug my curves in all the right places. The dress is incredibly comfortable to wear, making it ideal for a night of dancing or socializing at a cocktail party. The one-shoulder design adds a touch of sophistication and a hint of allure. It's not too revealing, striking the perfect balance between elegance and a modern edge. The long sleeves are a nice touch, making it suitable for various occasions, especially during cooler seasons. Read more
items.author: Marika

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress One Shoulder Bodycon Cocktail Long Sleeve Ruched is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress One Shoulder Bodycon Cocktail Long Sleeve Ruched is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, White, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
